News.headline: Sunday Football At The Daggers: 11th December
News.page_title: Sunday Football At The Daggers: 11th December
News.URL_keywords: Sunday Football At The Daggers: 11th December
News.short_description: Enjoy a packed Sunday of football at the Daggers Bar.
News.description:
Football Sundays will be back between 12:00-7:00pm on Sunday with three games being shown live on Sky Sports, one from the Championship and two from the Premier League. Derby take on local rivals Nottingham Forest which kicks off at 12:00pm, then Manchester er United will host Totenham Hotspur at Old Trafford with a kick off of 2:15pm. Finally West Ham travel to Anfield to face high flying Liverpool at Anfield which kicks off at 4:30pm. 

Take advantage of the Football Sundays offers on selected drinks at £2.49, which include; Carling, Cask Ale, Bottle Coors, Carling English Cider and Koppaberg. 

These offers are open to members only. Season ticket holders are automatically members but anyone wishing to buy a membership on the day can do so by asking a member of bar staff. So make sure you buy your membership for just £2!
